meanings.definition: High-top sneakers or shoes that extend above the ankle.
meanings.sent1: She wore her hightops to the basketball game.
meanings.sent2: The kids at the park were all wearing hightops.
meanings.sent3: His hightops made him look like a superhero ready to take flight.
meanings.sent4: In her hightops, she felt invincible, like she could conquer any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The bright red hightops stood out in the crowd, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A style of footwear characterized by a high-top design.
meanings.sent1: The store had a great selection of trendy hightops.
meanings.sent2: Hightops have become popular among young people.
meanings.sent3: He tried to wear his hightops with a suit, but it looked funny.
meanings.sent4: The hightops added a rebellious edge to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The classic black hightops matched everything in his wardrobe.

meanings.definition: To refer to sneakers or shoes with a high-top design.
meanings.sent1: She liked to hightops as her go-to footwear choice.
meanings.sent2: People often hightops when they want a casual look.
meanings.sent3: He would hightops whenever he wanted to feel taller.
meanings.sent4: The coach would hightops to the team's uniform for the next game.
meanings.sent5: They decided to hightops for the event to keep it casual and comfortable.
